title: 820-4924 no keyboard, power button works, no liquid damage
message: Hi, have a pristine macbook here but it's not able to detect button pressed except the power button

title: 820-4924 no keyboard, power button works, no liquid damage
820-4924 no keyboard, power button works, no liquid damage
message:
Failing both trackpad and keyboard?
Not working before OSX login too?
Try to access boot menu.
Check first if all voltages are present on trackpad connector.

You should discard first trackpad board and flex.

title: 820-4924 no keyboard, power button works, no liquid damage
message: Hmm now that you mention it, I see a ton of corrosion on the trackpad board, However keyboard doesn't work without trackpad connected, should it work with just the keyboard by itself or no?

title: 820-4924 no keyboard, power button works, no liquid damage
message: It's the trackpad!!!!!! thank you peepps!

title: 820-4924 no keyboard, power button works, no liquid damage
message:
Keyboard will not work without trackpad.
All the information pass through trackpad board.
